Solana vs. Bitcoin

Bitcoin's security edges out Solana's due to its proven Proof of Work, massive hash rate, and high decentralization with over 13000 nodes, plus a 16-year hack-free record. Solana's Proof of Stake and Proof of History prioritize speed but face risks from fewer
